commands.label: Recalibrate Hamiltonian monitor
commands.impact: Locks the energy coupling coefficient and inertial metric to the antifragile optimum computed in the dossier.

commands.label: Adjust reward engine burn curve
commands.impact: Aligns emission schedule with the Landauer-calibrated burn policy.

commands.label: Rotate governance sentinels
commands.impact: Refreshes slashing guardians while keeping owner override authority.

commands.label: Update tax policy disclosure
commands.command: npm run owner:update-all -- --network mainnet --module TaxPolicy --acknowledgement "Participants accept AGI Jobs v2 tax terms."
commands.impact: Publishes the latest regulatory acknowledgement without touching business logic.
